      calculate the percentage of people that were in the park for some amount of time (0 to 1, 1 to 2, 2 to 3, 3 to 4), generated by visitors type. sends to client: ArrayList of Object cell[0] name cell[1] 0 to 1 percentage of visitors cell[2] 1 to 2 percentage of visitors cell[3] 2 to 3 percentage of visitors cell [4] 3 to 4 percentage of visitors.
      static void Comunication.waitlistReplay(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> recived, ConnectionToClient client)
      array list of object that contains: [0] - string "waitlistReplay" [1] - Boolean true if the order is now in place false if something went wrong. if the client say "no", an empty message will be sent to the client - ergo: nothing in cell [1].
